# The `FixLen` Namespace Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The exact size encodable in &quot;Fix&quot; variants of formats. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Definition

<CodeBlock>namespace llvm::msgpack::FixLen &#123; ... &#125;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

The exact size encodable in &quot;Fix&quot; variants of formats.

The only objects for which an exact size makes sense are of <a href="/docs/api/structs/extension">Extension</a> type.

For example, FixExt4 stores an extension type containing exactly four bytes.

</DoxygenPage>
